contest-event.event-date: Feb. 9, 1985 D Durham League Contest (Section A) Durham League Contest (Section A) 10 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-a The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Resurgam Leisure Centre, Peterlee, County Durham, England, UK Prizes - 1st £100 and trophy, 2nd £60 and trophy, 3rd £40 and trophy. 7 bands competed. Oct. 11, 2014, 1:57 p.m. Jan. 20, 2017, 9:59 p.m. 1 Easington Colliery Band Alan Boyer 2 Reg Vardy Band Eric Cunningham 3 Kirkbymoorside Town Band Les Maw 4 NASUWT Riverside Alan Hope 5 Yarm & District Band Chris Lawn 6 Westoe Band Dennis Noble 7 Broughtons Brass [Durham] Cecil Peacock Jnr Withdrawn Consett-Whitbread Trophy G.
